import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function Contact() { const [data, setDate] = useState({ name:'', phone:'', email:'', msg:'' }); const inputEvent=(event)=>{ const {name, value} = event.target; setDate((preValue)=>{ return{ ...preValue, [name]:value } }) } const formSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); alert(`${data.name}`) } return ( <>

Contact Us

); }
